Text:
Please, watch your language. My schedule has nothing common with torrents I have upped.
And... nothing has really changed. Almost nothing.  It MUST be done. Shame on you for calling me out. Just yesterday I seeded 24 GIGABYTES, and today probably double...

What do yo want me to say? Perhaps - donations in food would be accepted? Oh, I have free internet access... no worries about money? When everything becomes free?

Sure, unless you see any other comment.
BTW, if you're fine with my "reductions" you would probably said so.

"NEW SCHEDULE (and NO more requests):"

Words "no more requests" should take care of "people know not to request those", right?
